Question.Subject: wot addon for firefox help?
Question.Content:
i use wot, have been using it for a while, and just now realized that site's reputations are really only reliable if a lot of people rate them. but i can't find a way to see the total amount of ratings
my question is, how do you check how many people have rated a site on wot?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi there,
It doesn't tell you how many people have view the website. But, on the tool bar you can see a (GREEN CAPITAL O) which gives you rating about the website. As regarding excellent / no information / bad etc..
Hope this help.
Take care
Sam
